title: Chute Libre
synopsis: Pour une femme obsédée par sa notoriété sur les médias sociaux, se faire inviter à un mariage huppé représente une aubaine inespérée. Mais c'était compter sans le voyage.
writtor: Michael Schur, Rashida Jones, Charlie Brooker

critics.name: Wenlei Ma News.com.au
critics.comments: Bryce Dallas Howard is perfect as the pink-clad, sing-song Lacie, who only shows flashes of her real self occasionally.

critics.name: Alison Willmore BuzzFeed News
critics.comments: Like all the best Black Mirrors, this is just a few short steps from current reality. It's not one of the best, though. It    sets up the premise crisply, then spends far too much time labouring the point.
